name: nativescript-google-analytics
description: Integrate native google analytics iOS and Android widgets into NativeScript

scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && ns build android && ns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && ns build ios && ns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && ns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.debug.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns debug ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.debug.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && ns debug android --syncAllFiles
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && npm run package && cd ../demo && ns plugin add ../publish/package/*.tgz && ns install
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules
